message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $9,500.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500?
